member.name: M:MDEdit.AsynchronousImageCache.ImageUriResolverSynchronous(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Resolves an image Uri synchronously. If the image has already been downloaded previously and is available in the cache, its path on disk is returned immediately. Otherwise, this method blocks until the image is downloaded. If an image is requested by this method while it is being downloaded as a result of a call to , it is downloaded a second time.
member.param: The Uri of the image to download, either absolute or relative to the .
The base Uri for resolving the .
